a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Government aid to least developed countries as a share of GNI
Net official development assistance from the OECD Development Assistance Committee donors to the world's least
developed countries, as a percentage of each donor's gross national income (GNI)
Data source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
